name: Xavier_Dade
content:
Xavier Dade was a Human male Jedi who was affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Standing 1.8 meters, he was streetwise and skilled in survival, conning others, brawling, and dodging. He carried a hold-out blaster and a syntherope and wore a set of robes.
Xavier Dade was created for the Rebel Characters Adventure Set, a boxed set of metal miniatures released in 1989 by West End Games to be used with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. Dade's character type was listed as "Male Minor Jedi" and his model came unpainted.
